content:
InputEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that handles input related routed events.

In this Article

public delegate void InputEventHandler(object sender, InputEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
InputEventHandler

Remarks

No existing event in WPF uses the KeyboardEventHandler delegate. The event data type for this class, InputEventArgs, is the base class for various more specific event data classes for input. InputEventArgs defines the event data properties of input events that are common regardless of the device that initiated the event.

An example of a delegate that uses InputEventArgs derived event data and that corresponds to an existing input event is KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler.
